page.title: 18ATTITUDES TO VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: Many people like the village because it is quiet and peaceful. Ever since the Quarry Centre has opened people have thought that the village has been improved. Before there were many shops around the village, but they all closed down. Some people think that the village has changed too much and should change back to what it was. There used to be a village policeman and he went around to schools all over the Weald and tell people about road safety. There is a small bus service in the village for people who go to Tunbridge Wells for their shopping. The post office in the Quarry Centre is liked by pensioners and people who get their pensions and allowances. Most hope that more people could move into the village to become a thriving population again.
